replies.body: Championship jewels are hextech crafting mats that can be used to upgrade Worlds team icons.  More information on how that works can also be found in our [Worlds ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)guide.  Let me know if you have any questions!
so what will happen to the leftover ones after worlds ill have like 20 of them.

Unfortunately, I don't have any details on what will become of the items after the event is over.  When we had the [project ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ)event, leftover materials were disenchantable.  I'm guessing this may be a similar case, but I can't say for sure until that time comes.  Hang tight and use as many as you can until then!

I'm really hoping something becomes of them. I have 250 and I haven't received a single gemstone since the event. I already own Hextech Annie (received from gemstones) and was hoping to build up 10 more for that awesome Vayne skin, it'd be really nice if you could trade the jewels in for hextech items. (such as gemstones *wink* *wink*) (perhaps 25 tokens = 1 gemstone so that i can get my vayne skin *wink* *wink*) (or 50 = 1, beggars can't be choosers) :P 

<3
riot please i have so many leftover jewels do something for them L(
